Chapter 3: Batch Normalization

What BN solves is gradients vanishing. The operation is to normalize inputs in a per-batch fashion: subtract all samples by a mean and divide them by the std. It later applies back a “scale and shift”.

Inside a neural network, the “Internal Covariate Shift” accumulates between each layer and BN reduces this effect.
